Sentencas: Sr- and Mg-doped LaGaO3 ultrafine powders were prepared by a sol-gel process that involves an acetate solution of the cations followed by ammonia peptization.
Titulo: Wet chemical synthesis of Sr- and Mg-doped LaGaO3, a perovskite-type oxide-ion conductor

Sentencas: The formed gel precursor consists of a hydrous complex of hydroxo and acetate ligands with the cations.
Titulo: Wet chemical synthesis of Sr- and Mg-doped LaGaO3, a perovskite-type oxide-ion conductor

Sentencas: Dehydration occurs when the gel is heated, and the complex of hydroxo and acetate ligands with the cations precipitates.
Titulo: Wet chemical synthesis of Sr- and Mg-doped LaGaO3, a perovskite-type oxide-ion conductor

Sentencas: Thermal analysis (DTA/TGA) reveals endothermic peaks corresponding to the decomposition of the hydroxo ligand at 220 degrees C and the acetate ligand at 280 degrees C followed by a strong exothermic peak at 330 degrees C; gases are liberated by the cleavage of the CH3COO- ligands.
Titulo: Wet chemical synthesis of Sr- and Mg-doped LaGaO3, a perovskite-type oxide-ion conductor

Sentencas: The coupling of the endothermic peak at 280 degrees C and the exothermic peak at 330 degrees C is found to be a characteristic phenomenon for the breakup of the CH3COO- bond.
Titulo: Wet chemical synthesis of Sr- and Mg-doped LaGaO3, a perovskite-type oxide-ion conductor

Sentencas: The IR spectroscopy of products at different stages of decomposition further confirms the existence of OH- and CH3COO- ligands and the assumptions about chemical reactions made in this study.
Titulo: Wet chemical synthesis of Sr- and Mg-doped LaGaO3, a perovskite-type oxide-ion conductor

Sentencas: TEM observations show an average 50-nm particle size after calcination at 500 degrees C.
Titulo: Wet chemical synthesis of Sr- and Mg-doped LaGaO3, a perovskite-type oxide-ion conductor

Sentencas: The X-ray diffraction patterns indicate a single perovskite cubic phase after sintering at 1400 degrees C, yielding a 94% dense sample.
Titulo: Wet chemical synthesis of Sr- and Mg-doped LaGaO3, a perovskite-type oxide-ion conductor

Sentencas: Hydrothermal treatment of the gel and the Pechini method were also used for comparison.
Titulo: Wet chemical synthesis of Sr- and Mg-doped LaGaO3, a perovskite-type oxide-ion conductor
Wet chemical synthesis of Sr- and Mg-doped LaGaO3, a perovskite-type oxide-ion conductor
